headline: NiSource to Release First Quarter 2025 Financial Results and Host Conference Call on May 7
summary: MERRILLVILLE, Ind., April 23, 2025--NiSource Inc. to release first quarter 2025 financial results and host investors call on May 7.

headline: Transcript : NiSource Inc., Q1 2025 Earnings Call, May 07, 2025
summary: Presentation Operator MessageOperator Good morning, ladies and gentlemen. Thank you for standing by, and welcome to the NiSource First Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call. [Operator Instructions]
